name: Combustion (Jam Demo)
description:
Description

You are the current host of the Eternal Smoke. 

Factories have popped up throughout the land trying to harness the power of the Smoke through malicious ways, stop them.

Solve Puzzles, Destroy Enemies, Consume their Smoke, Transform.

Instructions:
  • Arrow Keys for Movement
  • Z to Jump (you can double jump while in magical girl form)
  • C to Toggle Smoke Control (while in normal form)
  • X to callback your Smoke  (while in normal form)
  • Q to Transform (must have full smoke meter to transform)
  • X to attack (while in magical girl form)

Created for Magical Girl Game Jam #7 | Theme: Smoking Dragon
https://itch.io/jam/magical-girl-game-jam-7

There were lots of plans that weren't able to be accomplished in the time of the jam, but I'm really happy with how it turned out nonetheless!

Music by https://www.youtube.com/@AimToHeadOfficial
"[FREE] Dark Techno / EBM / Industrial Type Beat 'HEARTLESS' | Background Music"
